Class ec.ifc.stonelook.SLWindowBorder 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.Border
           |
           +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLWindowBorder
class SLWindowBorder
extends Border
Subclass of Border that's used on SLWindows. Since SLWindows are always created with this border, it shouldn't be necessary to access this class outside of this package.

This class is not public and can therefore cannot be used outside this package.
